81e4b6659d26f35ba6d6276b3cb3413ffe4b","dweb:/ipfs/QmVuEbxKdbD4DQAmeNauT2fS8RdLF3apUHdfUKgLE2od3z"]}},"version":1}

buyCredits(uint256).details: SUITE is transferred to treasury, Credits minted to user      Treasury can later redeem SUITE for USDC to pay API costs

params._suiteToken: Address of the SUITE share token

deposit(uint256).details: Auto-deposits to Yearn vault, mints proportional SUITE

returns.price: Price in USDC (6 decimals) per SUITE (18 decimals)

returns._0: Total USDC value of Yearn position

returns.shareOfVault: User's percentage of vault (in basis points)

migrateYearnVault(address).details: Withdraws all from old vault, deposits to new vault      User SUITE balances unchanged - seamless migration

params.newYearnVault: Address of the new Yearn vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns.creditsAmount: Amount of credits that would be received

returns.suiteAmount: Amount of SUITE that would be minted

returns.assetAmount: Amount of USDC that would be returned

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Redeems from Yearn vault, burns SUITE, returns USDC

creditsBonusBps().notice: Bonus multiplier for credits (in basis points, 10000 = 1x, 12000 = 1.2x)

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit USDC and receive SUITE shares

getSharePrice().notice: Get the current share price (USDC per SUITE)

getTotalAssets().notice: Get total assets managed by this vault (in Yearn)

migrateYearnVault(address).notice: Migrate to a new Yearn vault

previewDeposit(uint256).notice: Preview deposit - how much SUITE for a given USDC amount

previewWithdraw(uint256).notice: Preview withdrawal - how much USDC for a given SUITE amount

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw USDC by burning SUITE shares

withdrawFees().notice: Withdraw accumulated protocol fees to treasury

yearnVault().notice: Current Yearn vault for yield generation
